cab.content: 1, During the past week the staff of the Department have been principally engaged in further revision of the draft Education Bill and in carrying out the preliminary arrangements for the administration of the Supplementary Grant for Elementary Education.2, After consultation with the Pood Production Department of the Board of Agriculture I have issued a Circular to Local Education Authorities and Governing Bodies of Secondary Schools drawing attention to the urgent importance of increasing the food supply of this Country and expressing the hope that Secondary Schools will put forth their full energies by increasing, where possible, the amount of land already taken for the purpose of cultivation,4th May, 1917,
